name: Older & Wiser Speed Shop 53 Chevy - OW001
description:
Older & Wiser Speed Shop - OW001

Older & Wiser Speed Shop is our brand dedicated to the Original Gearhead.

PLEASE NOTE: This graphic features a distressed finish to create the authentically retro look our products are famous for.

Sizing and t-shirt style

Sizing: S M L XL XXL
Width 18 20 22 24 26
Length 28 29 30 31 32

  • Adult short sleeve t-shirt - 100% cotton preshrunk jersey
  • Ultra tight knit surface
  • Seamless collar
  • Taped neck and shoulders
  • Double needle stitching

Shipping and handling charges

All orders are shipped from Calgary, Alberta, Canada using Canada Post. If you need to receive items faster than our standard shipping options, please contact us PRIOR to ordering.

  • USA – Small Packet AIR is $9.00 and $3.00 for each additional t-shirt (4-10 days)
  • CANADA – Xpresspost is $9.00 and $3.00 for each additional t-shirt (1-2 days between major centres)
  • For INTERNATIONAL shipping please contact us PRIOR to ordering with your order details to determine the exact shipping costs.
